item.description:
This is going to be an absolutely fantastic workshop given by Ellen Shapiro on using transparencies and transfer techniques of all different sorts in our artwork.

Most of the materials will be supplied to the participants. We're putting together a materials list which will be included in the class fee. It won't exceed $15/person for everything, so sign up and get ready to add a really fabulous technique to your repertoire!

rm

group.name: New England Artist Trading Cards Plus (ATCs+) Meetup Group

item.name: Transparency/Transfer Workshop
